title: Moon Phase PRO - Watch Face

description: Beautifully crafted Android watch (analog + digital), presenting Moon Phases.PRO version includes also:- battery life indicator,- current date presentation,- customization (digital / analog / date),- interactive and ambient modes.Not sure if it's worth the money?Try Moon Phase for FREE!https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=eu.stettiner.moonphasewatchfaceDesigned for Android Wear.Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.
descriptionHTML:
Beautifully crafted Android watch (analog + digital), presenting Moon Phases.

PRO version includes also:
- battery life indicator,
- current date presentation,
- customization (digital / analog / date),
- interactive and ambient modes.

Not sure if it's worth the money?
Try Moon Phase for FREE!
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=eu.stettiner.moonphasewatchface

Designed for Android Wear.
Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.
comments: Beautiful, but... I wish I had the option not to show the seconds ticking away in the digital clock mode. Also the blinking colons between the numbers seem old fashioned, redundant (because of the second ticker), and kind of angry. Without these features, I think the digital version would seem more serene. It'd also be nice to have the option to put some sort of indicator around the outside edge of the analog clock, to make it easier to read.
Beautiful Face Great watch but would love the opportunity to change the colour of the numbers on the digital clock.
Paid and downloaded and can't find some it on phone or watch
